item.description:
This is our first official meetup, so we can certainly meet at my house. I will start a thread in the message board area to discuss potential meeting topics.



Hi Leah and Gretchen - I had an earlier meeting tomorrow from 4-6 that was just extended until 7pm! So I am moving our permaculture meetup to 7:45...since it's our first meetup, maybe we can just chat about what we'd like to do with future sessions, get to know each other, etc. and wrap up between 8:30 and 9pm if that's fine for you. Sorry for the last minute switch. I'm also adding a link to Google Maps for my address to help you find it. Thanks!

For more information, see http://maps.google.co...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Permaculture January Meetup
